subject: Order SSN2121
description_text:
Hi

Do you have any update on the following order trough your website?

Order was placed last friday and should be send from Germany (I’m in the
Netherlands)

Best

conversations.body_text: Hi Dave Kleinrensink,     This is your logistics tracking link. Your pedal base and motor have been shipped from China. The link will be sent to you via shipping notification updates. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=CE326620203DE

Ah okay. Last week I sent a mail to ask if it came from china, and I was
told because the German warehouse had stock, my shipment would come from
China and thus take 3 days and don’t have possible extra costum duty
costs.. if I understand it well, that has been changed now?


Op ma 28 jul 2025 om 12:29 schreef support@simsonn.com

Hi Dave Kleinrensink,    Please do not worry, there is no customs duty on your pedals shipped from Germany. There is also a high probability that there will be no customs duty on the other accessories sent by logistics channels. If customs duty is incurred, we will share the cost with you.

Thanks for the quick reply guys, once again!
??

Op ma 28 jul 2025 om 12:41 schreef support@simsonn.com
